alert.note: Alert for Gadsden (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 1:50PM EDT until April 03 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR GADSDEN...DECATUR...GRADY AND SEMINOLE COUNTIES... At 149 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Whigham to 8 miles south of Bainbridge to 6 miles north of Chattahoochee, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Donalsonville, Quincy, Havana, Cairo, Whigham, Greensboro, West Bainbridge, Chattahoochee, Gretna, Attapulgus, Iron City, Climax, Brinson, Juniper, Douglas City, Florence, Jamieson, Recovery and Harrells Still. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for southeastern Alabama...Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
